title: Modify a Subscription Item
description: A customer wants to swap an item in their upcoming monthly subscription box for a different one.

tasks.description: Log into their account and go to the 'Manage Subscription' page.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer accesses their subscription details.

tasks.description: Select the option to 'Edit' the next box.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer enters the editing mode for their upcoming order.

tasks.description: Remove one item and add a different item, then save the changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The contents of the next subscription order are successfully updated.
